name: Jordi Visser Labs
notes: 30+ year Wall Street veteran. AI-driven macro investing. Deep market analysis. President/CIO of Weiss Multi-Strategy Advisers.

name: The Compound
notes: Joshua Brown & Michael Batnick. Wealth management perspective. Weekly market breakdowns, interviews, macro takes.

name: Risk Reversal Media
notes: Dan Nathan & Guy Adami. Options-focused market commentary. Macro + single stock analysis. Connected to CNBC Fast Money.

name: Peter Diamandis
notes: Futurist, tech visionary. AI/exponential tech trends. Not trading-specific but shapes macro thesis on tech sectors.

name: tastylive
notes: Major options platform. 8hrs live daily. Premium selling focus. Huge library.

name: Option Alpha
notes: Beginner-friendly options education. Selling premium, high probability strategies. Automated trading focus.

name: Sky View Trading
notes: In-depth strategy videos. Whiteboard-style Greeks explanations. Premium selling case studies.

name: projectfinance
notes: Chris Butler. Clean educational content on common options strategies. Well-produced.

name: InTheMoney
notes: Adam. 320K+ subs, 14M+ views. Younger audience. Makes options accessible.

name: BestStockStrategy
notes: David Jaffee. Options selling focused. Direct competitor to premium-selling education.
